document_data.name: Luskan Stout
document_data.mainbody: '''Luskan stout''' was a dark malty brew from the city of [[Luskan]]. This [[stout]] was so thick it could be considered an entire meal in one tankard.
document_data.Powers: Luskan stout possessed some energizing and invigorating qualities.
document_data.History:
In [[1281 DR]], Luskan stout was imported into the [[Ten Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]] and was served by [[Grisella]] at her establishment - the [[Winter's Cradle Tavern]] of [[Easthaven]]

In the mid-to-late-15{{th}} century [[DR]], Luskan stout was available in the city of [[Neverwinter]], notably, at the [[Beached Leviathan]] tavern.
